item.title: What do Recipezaar employees do when they get together? Cook, naturally.
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Kathy visited Recipezaar headquarters for training this week, and we had a wonderful (and productive) time. We really couldn't be happier with the "rest of our team". For her last night we all cooked a mess of Recipezaar recipes, and had a blast taking photos of them. The menu included: Green Onion Pancakes Sichuan Pepper-Salt Prawns Ginger Sesame Asparagus Aromatic Sticky Rice Best Cherry Pie It is so nice to like the folks you work with. Just wish Kathy was closer, I'd love to do this every week!
